mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO tmall_order (orderCode, totalAmount, actualAmount, buildTime, payTime, totalCount, closeReason, refundAmount, confirmTime, alreadyPayAmount) VALUES (#{orderCode}, #{totalAmount}, #{actualAmount}, #{buildTime}, #{payTime}, #{totalCount}, #{closeReason}, #{refundAmount}, #{confirmTime}, #{alreadyPayAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(temp.`quantity` * temp.costPrice) AS totalCost FROM (SELECT tmall_order.`orderCode`,tmall_order.`payTime`, order_detail.`productCode`,order_detail.`quantity`, product.costPrice FROM tmall_order,order_detail,product WHERE tmall_order.`orderCode`= order_detail.`orderCode` AND order_detail.`productCode`=product.`productCode`) AS temp WHERE temp.payTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth},'%')
